author: Kingtut 101
title: Mess Hall (Small)
text:
A small building with a cafeteria that is used to feed your prisoners. This building can feed up to 300 prisoners.

Meals Eaten: ${fP}/${fMHO}

author: Kingtut 101
title: Mess Hall (Medium)
text:
A small building with a cafeteria that is used to feed your prisoners. This building can feed up to 600 prisoners.  

Meals Eaten: ${fP}/${fMHO}

author: Kingtut 101
title: Mess Hall (Large)
text:
A small building with a cafeteria that is used to feed your prisoners. This building can feed up to 1200 prisoners.

Meals Eaten: ${fP}/${fMHO}
